OOC: Oops, my last post was Re: Optimus, not Re: Rodimus. All well.

::Hot Rod::

"Please dont think I'm better than you, or any other bot. I'm just
another soldier now. And you bet I'd think you worth my time." He leaned
down, and kissed her.
